When your pet has a medical condition, your veterinarian might prescribe one or more medications intended to manage, treat or cure the problem. Although there are some veterinary-specific drugs, many of the drugs used in veterinary medicine are the same as those used in people. ata medicine er vitor deoa lagbe jeta already medicines doc file deoa ache ... amra kono vabe daye thakbo na . jekono kisu medicine use korar agee doctor or prescribe hoa lagbe
